name: 邱家吉
objective: 本課程主要介紹工程應用上常使用的數學方法，透過模擬解題與詮釋，使學生理解如何運用數學工具解決工程問題。課程內容包括(1)一階常微分方程式、(2)高階常微分方程式、(3)常微分方程式系統、(4)常微分方程式級數解、(5)Laplace轉換、(6)常微分方程式數值解(4)線性代數及(6)矩陣及向量等章節，訓練同學在理論，計算及實驗間建立正確的認知及意義。
schedule:
Week 1 Introduction
Week 2 First order ODEs
Week 3 First order ODEs
Week 4 First order ODEs
Week 5 Second and higher order linear ODEs
Week 6 Second and higher order linear ODEs
Week 7 Second and higher order linear ODEs
Week 8 Second and higher order linear ODEs
Week 9 Midterm exam
Week 10 Systems of ODEs
Week 11 Serious solutions of differential equations
Week 12 Laplace transforms
Week 13 Laplace transforms
Week 14 Numerical solution of ODEs
Week 15 Linear algebra: matrices, vectors, determinants.
Week 16 Linear algebra: matrices, vectors, determinants.
Week 17 Linear algebra: matrices, vectors, determinants.
Week 18 Final exam
materials: Kreyszig, E. (2011): Advanced engineering mathematics, 10th edition.
